properties.headline: Flood Warning issued January 9 at 7:26PM CST by NWS Chicago IL
properties.description:
...Forecast flooding Changed from Minor to Moderate severity for the
following rivers in Indiana...

Kankakee River at Dunns Bridge affecting Porter County

The following forecasts are based on observed precipitation as well
as forecast precipitation 24-48 hours into the future.

The Flood Warning continues for
The Kankakee River at Dunns Bridge, or from US-421 south of La
Crosse downstream to IN-49 south of Kouts.
* from Monday morning until further notice.
* At  700 PM Thursday the stage was 5.4 feet.
* Flood stage is 10.0 feet.
* Moderate flooding is forecast.
* Forecast...Rise above flood stage by late Monday morning and
continue to rise to near 12.1 feet by Thursday evening. Additional
rises are possible thereafter.
* Impact...At 12.0 feet...Secondary roads near the river flood.
properties.instruction:
Safety message...If you encounter a flooded roadway...turn around and
find an alternate route.

Additional information can be found at weather.gov/chicago.

NWSheadline: Forecast flooding increased from Minor to Moderate severity
